entry.title: Cost Center Activity Cost Rate Planning Cost Calculation OPEX IFP
entry.content:
Dear All,

Could anyone assist me in understanding the code used to calculate cost center costs? While I understand the calculation logic for Amount and Quantity—since activity quantities are credited from the sender side—I’m not sure about the purpose of a specific part of the code. Could you please explain what that section is doing, and how we can verify it in SAC using dimensions and measures?

What is the purpose of running the Cost Rates data action in OPEX for cost rates? It seems that nothing new is being calculated—the same price appears as hard-coded in the actuals. Wouldn’t it be simpler to just copy those rates instead of performing the calculation?

entry.title: IFP OPEX Calculating CCTR Activity Quantities inversely
entry.content:
Dear All,

Could anyone assist me with an issue I’m facing? When I execute the standard code snippet for calculating quantities inversely in OPEX activity cost rate planning, it returns zero values against Cost Center CSTLG Unit A (US).

However, when I run the code I created in my customized model, it returns zero values against the Plant & Maintenance cost center — which I believe is correct, as Driver 5 mainly applies to that cost center.

Why might there be this difference between the standard IFP OPEX content and my customized model execution results?

could anyone of you assist am I doing wrong or am I misinterpretating ?

reusult 

In my case

entry.title: SAC to ECC Data Retraction
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Can anybody please confirm if data retraction to SAP ECC from SAC is available ?

Our setup contain BW middleware but its not HANA its based on MSSQL and we are on NEO environment so we cant utilize the DES (Data Export Service).

Thank you.

entry.title: Measures or account dimension in term of performance - SAC for planning
entry.content:
I have the following dilemma.
I have a new model and I don't need both account and measures. therefore, the first option is to create an account dimension and one "value" measure. Or a list of ~50 measures and no-account dimension.

I have few design reasons to prefer one of the options,

however my question is which option will provide a better performance?

 

thank you

entry.title: Is an OData Connection Possible Between SAC and DSP Without Tenant Integration?
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

Is it possible to create an OData connection between SAP Analytics Cloud and SAP DataSphere  even if the tenants are not linked to each other?

Thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: Calculated Account Behavior
entry.content:
Hello Gurus,

I have the below table in my story. I created calculated account in which gets the total budget from the actual version and audit dimension. The account works well if the project dimension is not pulled into the table. Once project dimension or any other dimension is pulled the table return empty result. I dont expect that this is a normal behavior. 

Attached below the table and the calculated account.

Thanks.

entry.title: Data Mismatch Issue in SAC Story after Import from File Server
entry.content:
I have built a story in SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) using an Analytic Model. The source data is coming from a file server through the SAP system. I have also applied some basic transformations before loading the data and running the import.

However, the issue is that the data displayed in my SAC report does not exactly match the data I loaded. Additionally, there are some public dimensions defined, and their mapping has already been set in the import section of the data.

Could you please guide me on why the data mismatch is occurring and how I can ensure that the SAC report reflects the exact loaded data?

entry.title: Enable Now Data Integration into SAP Analytics Cloud
entry.content:
Greetings Community!

Currently, I manually transfer content data from SAP Enable Now, cloud edition  (SEN) to SAP Analytics Cloud  (SAC) each month using Excel, for review purposes. While SEN documentation indicates that data can be integrated into Microsoft Power BI, I have not found information regarding integration with SAC

Is there a way to establish a direct connection between SEN and SAC to ensure continuous and accurate data synchronization, eliminating the need for manual uploads? Thanks for any insight!

Best,

Andrew

entry.title: How to create 2 input control filters dependent on each other in story
entry.content:
Kindly help me on below requirement please;

suppose I have 2 Dimensions as shared in below screenshots:

Profitcenter (attribute is Group)

Projectcode ((attribute is Group)

Requirement is I need to apply 2 input control filters on each dim above in my input form in story but Profit center values should be dependent on project code selection ..e.g.. if we select projectcode= PP_SRW then the respective profit center should be seen/ selected only…i.e.. PB_SRW, 0569A00000,0569B00000 (but NOT 0123A00000 as its under PP_XXX attribute of profitcenter which is diff from PB_SRW) and accordingly my table data should be filtered.

I already tried with Dataaction with below script but somehow its not writing value (1*0=0) in form. ALso not sure if this is the correct approach for above requirement .

entry.title: Tracking Import Job Status and Sending Daily Email Notifications in SAP Analytics Cloud
entry.content:
In SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC), I am scheduling multiple import jobs for a particular data source where the data is imported from an SAP ERP system.

Is there a way to track the status of these scheduled import jobs (e.g., success, failure, duration, etc.) and automatically send a daily email notification summarizing the job refresh status?

If yes, could someone please suggest the detailed steps or best approach to achieve this?

entry.title: Extract delta data from S/4HANA CDS view to SAC Imported Model
entry.content:

Question : We will extract actual data for every month, but how can i deal with limitation for 'OData'.

(*Not exactly, but there is 800K row limitation when extract data for one time)

So, I just think when extract for imported connection, we have to do filtering by date just one month every time like below image.

 

If you have any great ideas, please share with me.

Thank you!

entry.title: Preparation Cerification SAC
entry.content:
Hello everyone, I’m currently preparing for the C_SAC_2501 exam, and I have some doubts about a few questions. Please, I would really appreciate your help to better understand the correct answer to each question.


You have a dimension with members for product groups and products. Each product group has associated products. You want to plan by product group without disaggregating into the products.

How can you do this?

Disable allocations
Use two properties
Disable distribution
Use two hierarchies


You are creating a new public version. Which categories can you use?

Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.

Forecast
Budget
Predictive
Actual
You are creating a script for an advanced data action. Which character designates a virtual variable member?

%
/
#
.


You have a story in My Files. You want your colleague to review and comment on the story. What must you do?

Create a Review task for the story
Add a Comment widget to the story
Include the story in a Discussion
Share with View access


What can you do to reduce the data refresh time when opening a story? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question.

Avoid tables with more than 500 rows and 60 columns
Load widgets in the background
Avoid prompts
Use responsive pages
Use conditional formatting


You have a live data model with two dimensions: Firstname and Lastname. Users want a single dimension in the data model that displays the dimensions as Lastname, Firstname.

What must you do?

Create the combined data in the source system data model.
Create a calculated dimension in the story.
Create a dimension in the live data model.
Group the Firstname and Lastname in the data model.

 


You have a story based on an import model. The transaction data in the model's data source changes.

How can you update the data in the model?

Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question.

Refresh the import job
Schedule the import
Allow model import
Refresh the story


You have a dataset that extracts data from an SAP Business Warehouse (SAP BW) system. The data in the SAP BW system changes. How can you update the dataset?

You must refresh the story that uses the dataset.
You must manually reimport the data.
You can schedule the dataset to update on a regular basis.
You must create a new dataset.


Which SAP Analytics Cloud feature uses natural language processing?

Smart insight
Data analyzer
Digital boardroom
Just Ask feature


Which automatically created dimension type can you delete from an analytic data model?

Date
Generic
Version
Organization

entry.title: Transporting Deleted Teams from Test to Production in SAP SAC
entry.content:
Dear Team,

As part of our recent housekeeping activity, we identified several unused Teams in  SAP Analytics Cloud  and have deleted them in the Test environment. To maintain consistency across systems, I would like to transport these deletions to the Production environment.

Could anyone please guide me through the steps required to perform this transport? Specifically, I want to ensure that all Teams deleted in Test are also removed in Production following the transport process.

Thank you for your support.

Regards,
Om Pandya

entry.title: sap sac model
entry.content: My source system is SuccessFactors where Date of Birth is maintained in it. I want to create a model  that calculate age using Date of Birth field. Is it possible to create calculation in SAC to calculate age using the DOB column?

entry.title: SAC Certification
entry.content:
Hello everyone, I’m currently preparing for the C_SAC_2501 exam, and I have some doubts about a few questions. Please, I would really appreciate your help to better understand the correct answer to each question.

 

How can you improve the performance of advanced data actions? Note:

There are 3 correct answers to this question.

Use fewer MEMBERSET statements
Use fewer aggregation dimension functions
Use fewer data functions
Use fewer FOREACH functions
Use fewer IF statements

-------------------------

What can you do with a multi action? 

Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question. 

  • Run allocation processes 
  • Approve data 
  • Run allocation data actions 
  • Import transaction data 

---------------------------------------

 

You are creating a data action to copy data from one year to the next. 

In the parameter for the source year, which default setting must you change? 

  • Granularity 
  • Level 
  • Hierarchy 
  • Cardinality 

 

 

------------------------------------

When scrolling down in a long table, how can you retain column headers? Note: There are 2 correct answers to this question. 

  • Enable Keeping member names visible 
  • Freeze Dimension Header Column 
  • Enable Auto-Size and Page Table Vertically 
  • Freeze Dimension Header Row 

 

 

-----------------------------------------------------

 

What can you do to reduce the data refresh time when opening a story? Note: There are 3 correct answers to this question. 

  • Avoid tables with more than 500 rows and 60 columns 
  • Load widgets in the background 
  • Avoid prompts 
  • Use responsive pages 
  • Use conditional formatting 

 

---------------------------------------------------

What is the main benefit a business user can gain from using SAP Business Data Cloud:  

  • Data Management 
  • Data Analysis 
  • Data Integration 
  • Data Intelligence 

 

Thanks!!
